kumar ee sulu pirisa athara wadath ka්riyakari ayaku wiya. 1994 ‘jathiya galawaganime peramuna’ yatathe parlimenthu aasanayak dinaganima dakwa saka්riyawu me pirisa athara yam yam mathabheda nisa jawipe nayakathwaya somawansha amarasinha, tilwin silwa, nandana gunathilaka saha thawath kihipadenek kendra karagath deshapalana mandalayak athata path wuye 1995di thangalle pawathi samuluwen pasuwaya.
